name: shutit
description: A complex cyber solution for the Shuttle Queue cyber problem, using big-data cyber-space cloud security systems.
author: HackTeamB1

scripts.compile: eslint js/* && rm -f ../shutit/static/shutit/js/*  && rm -f ../shutit/static/shutit/css/*  && rm -f ../shutit/templates/shutit/* && babel js/ --out-dir ../shutit/static/shutit/js/ && cp css/* ../shutit/static/shutit/css/ && cp templates/* ../shutit/templates/shutit/
